ImageQuality.comm: Sharp images with good color and contrast.

cont.entity_a: Sharp images across all lighting conditions. Image quality comparable to L series lenses.
cont.entity_b: High-quality images with superb clarity. Superb contrast and color. Sharp center image quality.

cont.entity_a: Heavy and large compared to kit lenses.
cont.entity_b: Heavy but sturdy build. Weather-proofed and solid construction.

cont.entity_a: Wide angle to mid-range telephoto focal range, ideal for walk-around use.
cont.entity_b: Wide angle focal length range from 16-35mm.

LowLight.comm: Great for low light photography with f/2.8.

cont.entity_a: Excellent low light performance with image stabilization.
cont.entity_b: Sharp photos in low light with f/2.8.

cont.entity_a: Great for indoor photos without flash. Great for video and photo use. Excellent for landscapes and portraits.
cont.entity_b: Great for landscapes and night photography. Great for interior and landscape photography. Great for travel and versatile use.

cont.entity_a: Not weather-sealed, prone to dust. Dust issue inside the lens. Loud image stabilizer system.
cont.entity_b: Weather-proofed and solid construction. Some edge blurring at widest angles. Wide angle without fisheye distortion.

cont.entity_a: Effective image stabilization for low-light photography.
